faction.name: MacrophageHistiocytes
faction.description:
The galaxy is being invaded by enormous biological Macrophages. They prey on the AI for metal, and will try to eat your ships too.
<color=#f25e1c>VARIABLE IMPACT:</color> This faction plays differently, being capable of expanding but not in a traditional manner. Depending on their start, they can be extremely strong, or a bit more low impact.

custom_field.name: Intensity
custom_field.description: Just how terrifying is this faction?

custom_field.name: NumberToSeed
custom_field.description:
What percent of the galaxy should be claimed by Macrophage Hives? Setting this too high may result in some... interesting map layouts.
Only used for the Hives spawning option.

custom_field.name: Allegiance
custom_field.description: Is this faction friendly to the AI(s), or nobody?
custom_field.arbitrary_options: Hostile To All,Hostile To Players Only,Minor Faction Team Red,Minor Faction Team Blue,Minor Faction Team Green

custom_field.name: SpawningOptions
custom_field.description:
Modifies the spawning style of this faction.
Default spawns a single Telium on a scaling number of planets based on Intensity.
Lone Telium spawns a single angry Telium that never expands but has vastly increased production capabilities.
Clustered Telia spawns Telia in groups of 2 across the galaxy based on Intensity.
Hives spawns a large number of Telium, along with a bunch of extra mines, on planets with minimal ai presence. These planets can be claimed at no AIP cost, if you can scrub them clean. You can adjust the Hives spawn percentage above.
